posts.post_content:
I have about $550 to spend on a Cy Young T206... looking mostly for eye appeal. Let me know if you have anything in that range.

Thanks,
Mike

If you don't mind back, offer him $550:

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/T206-Cy-Young-Portrait-PSA-1-5-Piedmont-350-Very-Eye-Appealing-Front-/152669368693?hash=item238bcdb175:g:i2gAAOSwrdBZl6Nz[/url]

Another good looking example under $500:

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/1909-T206-Tobacco-Baseball-Card-CY-YOUNG-Bare-Hand-Shows-SGC-10-1-/152705189085?hash=item238df044dd:g:2JYAAOSw0ThZnbpQ[/url]

Neither are mine, nor do i know sellers...just did a quick eBay search. Good luck.
PEEK enterprises is that your Cy Young mentioned above? Any interest in saving ebay fees?

I have a PSA 2 MC for sale on my site in the FS/FT folder. It is priced a little higher than your target price but I can work with you some on it. The link is in my signature line.
                                             Thanks,
                                               Steve
thanks Steve, I'll take a look and let you know

Thanks Scott, I should have specified that I'm looking for the portrait T206 Cy Young. You offered a great card at a great price... just not the one I"m looking for.

Thanks,
Mike
